trans-unit.source: Represents an activity-based callback.
Activity delegates enable activity authors to expose callbacks with specific signatures that users of the activity can provide activity-based handlers for.

There are two types of activity delegates: <xref:System.Activities.ActivityAction%601> is used for invoking activities that do not have a return value, and <xref:System.Activities.ActivityFunc%601> is used for invoking activities that do have a return value.
Activity delegates are useful in scenarios where a child activity must be constrained to having a certain signature.
Called by derived class constructors to initialize the object.
Gets or sets an optional friendly name that is used for debugging, validation, exception handling, and tracking.
This property is read-only at runtime.
If the value is set at runtime, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
A friendly name that is used for debugging, validation, exception handling, and tracking.
When implemented in a derived class, returns the <xref href="System.Activities.DelegateOutArgument"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Activities.ActivityDelegate"></xref>.
An out argument for the <xref href="System.Activities.ActivityDelegate"></xref>.
Gets or sets the activity that is represented by this <xref href="System.Activities.ActivityDelegate"></xref>.
This property is read-only at runtime.
If the value is set at runtime, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
The activity that is represented by this <xref href="System.Activities.ActivityDelegate"></xref>.
Supplies a list of runtime arguments for the <xref href="System.Activities.ActivityDelegate"></xref>.
When overridden in a derived class, this method can be used to customize the arguments that are used by the <xref:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate>.
The list to be populated with runtime arguments.
Indicates whether the <xref href="System.Activities.ActivityDelegate.DisplayName"></xref> property value should be serialized to XAML.

<xref:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate.ShouldSerializeDisplayName%2A> returns `true` if the <xref:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate.DisplayName%2A> was explicitly set on the <xref:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate>.
`true`, if the <xref href="System.Activities.ActivityDelegate.DisplayName"></xref> property value should be serialized; otherwise, `false`.

Returns a <xref href="System.String"></xref> representation of the <xref href="System.Activities.ActivityDelegate"></xref> that contains the <xref href="System.Activities.ActivityDelegate.DisplayName"></xref>.
A representation of the <xref href="System.Activities.ActivityDelegate"></xref> that contains the <xref href="System.Activities.ActivityDelegate.DisplayName"></xref>.
